subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Giambi hit a three-run homer in the second inning, and Bobby Abreu added a two-run shot in the sixth as the Yankees extended their winning streak to a season-high four games.
snippet: Jason Giambi hit a three-run homer in the second inning, and Bobby Abreu added a two-run shot in the sixth as the Yankees extended their winning streak to a season-high four games.
